mapper.select: select product.product_id AS productId, product.seller_id AS sellerId, product.product_type_id AS productTypeId, product.product_name AS productName, product.product_image AS productImage, price, product.discount_price AS discountPrice, storage, sale, state, product.create_time AS createTime, product.modify_time AS modifyTime from collect,product,user where user.user_id=collect.user_id and collect.product_id=product.product_id and username=#{username}
mapper.delete: delete from collect where product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
